tool_description: Calculates borrower's total debt obligations, debt-to-income ratios, and payment capacity based on existing debts and proposed loan terms.

existing_debts.description: List of existing monthly debt payments

include_housing.description: Whether to include housing in DTI calculation

error_messages: Invalid income amount: Monthly income must be greater than 0.
Negative debt values: All debt amounts must be non-negative.
Excessive debt load: Total debt obligations exceed reasonable limits (>80% of income).
Invalid housing payment: Housing payment cannot be negative.
usage: Provide monthly_income, existing_debts, and proposed_loan_payment, optionally specify housing_payment and include_housing flag. Returns comprehensive debt analysis.

total_monthly_debts.description: Sum of all existing monthly debt payments

back_end_dti.description: Total debt to income ratio including proposed loan

debt_capacity.description: Remaining debt capacity before reaching DTI limits

payment_shock.description: Percentage increase in monthly obligations from new loan
